name: Vegetated riparian corridor width
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus transformations feed primary production, regulate excess loads, and store or release nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Sufficient buffer filters nutrients, matching local references.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure riparian buffer width in GIS along the reach. Verify vegetation in the field where needed.

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Cropped or paved to bank edge.
Criteria: < ~5 m

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Narrow buffer with frequent breaks.
Criteria: ~5-15 m

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Mostly vegetated buffer with gaps.
Criteria: ~15-30 m

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Continuous native forest buffer on both banks.
Criteria: >= ~30 m width per bank
